name: snorq
description: Unified Chat System - Manage all your social media conversations in one place

scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run dev -w backend" "npm run dev -w frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build -w backend && npm run build -w frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w backend && npm run lint -w frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix -w backend && npm run lint:fix -w frontend
scripts.test: npm run test -w backend && npm run test -w frontend
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/dist frontend/dist

author: SNORQ Team
